name: Juggler's Game
description:
Juggler's Game is a small game that I've made in about seven hours.

In this game, you gotta keep the balls in the air as long as possible. If you fail to do so, ya lose!

If you can get a good high score, come on down to my discord server, where I'll give you a cool role if you can get a good score!

Note: This game IS playable on browser, but I HIGHLY recommend you play it as a standalone software. Here are a few upsides to doing so:

~ Ability to resize the window

~ More fancy shmancy particles

So what are  you waiting for? Go download the thing!
